#### Anova

##### One Way Anova for price by property type

```{r, cache=TRUE, eval=FALSE, tidy=TRUE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
# One Way Anova (Completely Randomized Design)
# Price vs. Property Type
Listings_Review <- Listings[complete.cases(Listings$price),c("review_scores_rating","property_type","room_type","price")]
one_way.fit <- aov(log(price+1) ~ property_type, data=Listings_Review)
layout(matrix(c(1,2,3,4),2,2))
plot(one_way.fit)
summary(one_way.fit)
AIC(one_way.fit)
BIC(one_way.fit)
```

##### Two Way Anova for Price vs. Property Type & Room Type

```{r, cache=TRUE, eval=FALSE, tidy=TRUE, warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
# Two Way Factorial Design 
# Price vs. Property Type & Room Type
two_way.fit <- aov(log(price+1) ~ property_type*room_type, data=Listings_Review)
layout(matrix(c(1,2,3,4),2,2))
plot(two_way.fit)
summary(two_way.fit)
AIC(two_way.fit)
BIC(two_way.fit)
```
